meta:attr.description: Efficiency vs pulse amplitude

meta:attr.description: Time vs. pulse amplitude

meta:attr.name: enabled
meta:attr.description: Perform this measurement.

meta:attr.name: enabled
meta:attr.description: Skip this measurement.

meta:attr.name: capacitor
meta:attr.description: Inject pulses through the device's internal capacitor.

meta:attr.name: capacitor
meta:attr.description: Inject pulses through the external capacitor.

meta:attr.name: amplitudeMin
meta:attr.description: The lowest pulse amplitude in DAC units.

meta:attr.name: amplitudeMax
meta:attr.description: The highest pulse amplitude in DAC units.

meta:attr.name: amplitudeStep
meta:attr.description: The pulse amplitude increment in DAC units.

meta:attr.name: nPulses
meta:attr.description: The number of pulses at each amplitude.

meta:attr.name: thresholdValue
meta:attr.description: The device's threshold is to be set to this value expressed in DAC units.

meta:attr.name: timeMin
meta:attr.description: The minimum TDC time recorded in TDC units. TDC resolution is 0.5 ns, thus the maximum allowed value of 1023 (10-bit data words) corresponds to 511 ns.

meta:attr.name: timeMax
meta:attr.description: The maximum TDC time recorded in TDC units. TDC resolution is 0.5 ns, thus the maximum allowed value of 1023 (10-bit data words) corresponds to 511 ns.
